goal_step: Alan has a plane to catch, that is departing for New York.
action_step: Alan is packing his bag before the trip.
resources_step: Alan gets to the airport on time, but has problems clearing security quickly.

goal_step: Edith wants to get an A in her final-year exam in art history.
action_step: Edith wakes up early and has a good breakfast before her exam.
resources_step: Edith has carefully researched the artists to be examined, yet feels nervous.

goal_step: Louise wants to shop at an expensive clothes store.
action_step: Louise gets her purse and leaves the house.
resources_step: Louise had extra spending money because of the money she had stolen from her grandma.

goal_step: When she comes home one evening, Mary is very hungry and needs something to eat.
action_step: On entering the kitchen, Mary checks her cupboards.
resources_step: Mary finds that her flatmate has left her a bowl of her least-favourite food and a note telling her to buy more food.

goal_step: Steve needs to do some gardening because his back-garden has become completely overgrown.
action_step: Steve goes outside and into his shed.
resources_step: Steve takes out the lawnmower and reflects on how much he hates tidying up his garden.

goal_step: Belinda is on a plane going to Los Angeles for a business meeting.
action_step: When Belinda reaches Los Angeles, she takes a taxi downtown to the meeting venue.
resources_step: Belinda's taxi takes her to the front door of the office block and she is content because she is early.

goal_step: John comes home early from work because himself and his wife are having a dinner party that evening.
action_step: After arriving home, he takes off his coat and goes to his wife in the kitchen.
resources_step: John finds the peeler and starts to prepare the potatoes for dinner, and his wife says he has done a good job.

goal_step: Lucy hates her old car and wants to buy a new one.
action_step: Lucy calls the bank to get a loan for a new car.
resources_step: The car dealer says her old car is a classic and worth thousands, and she is happy to sell it for practical reasons.

goal_step: Peter is rushing to get to College, on time, for a lecture.
action_step: On waking up, Peter gets dressed and brushes his teeth.
resources_step: Peter catches the bus and is unconcerned as it is a lovely spring day.

goal_step: Katie is trying to find her lost kitten.
action_step: Then, Katie goes into the kitchen because she hears a noise.
resources_step: Katie has a nice neighbour who is very observant.

goal_step: Bill is looking forward to going on his summer holidays, as he has been working hard for months.
action_step: Then, Bill packs his passport in his suitcase for the journey.
resources_step: Bill's luggage is lost and he has a terrible time on his holidays.

goal_step: Bob wants to quit his job because he is not credited for his hard work.
action_step: On arriving at the office, he turns on his computer and checks his emails.
resources_step: Bob has abandoned the idea of starting his own business, because investors were unimpressed by his business proposition.

goal_step: Karen is returning home on the bus and wants to avoid getting wet in the rain.
action_step: Karen decides to text her boyfriend, so he can pick her up from the bus-stop.
resources_step: Karen's boyfriend could not get off work early, and was annoyed at being asked to pick her up.

goal_step: Rebecca is at the beach and wants to go for a swim in the sea.
action_step: Rebecca then puts on her goggles and walks toward the sea.
resources_step: The lifeguard tells Rebecca the sea is unsafe to swim and there is bad weather today.

goal_step: Sally wants to buy a bottle of wine for her Friday evening dinner.
action_step: Sally decides to go to the corner-shop near her house.
resources_step: The shop is shut and Sally has an argument with a neighbour walking home.

goal_step: Anna has an important job interview to attend in the morning, that she cannot miss.
action_step: Going to bed, Anna sets her alarm clock for 7am.
resources_step: Anna has read nothing about the company but feels confident about the interview.

goal_step: After waking up, Michael goes downstairs to have his breakfast.
action_step: Then, Michael goes into the kitchen and makes some tea.
resources_step: Michael could not find tea bags to put in the pot and was reminded of the happy days when he was studying at university.

goal_step: Robert is working late to finish a long essay for his philosophy course.
action_step: Robert edits the formatting of his paper.
resources_step: Robert has not met the page requirement, but thinks the subject is very interesting.

goal_step: Sam is driving home in a hurry because he wants to watch a soccer match on TV.
action_step: Sam decides to take the highway, to get home sooner.
resources_step: Sam is running low on fuel, but relaxes as there is good music playing on the radio.

goal_step: Sean is in a foreign country and wants to contact his mother to let her know he is safe.
action_step: Sean takes out his mobile phone and dials her number.
resources_step: The network shows a weak signal, but Sean is looking forward to talking to his mother.
